statements.insert:
SELECT NVL(MAX(ENTRPRS_SN),0) + 1 AS EntrprsSn FROM TN_ENTRPRS
/* EntrprsDac.InsertEntrprs */ INSERT INTO TN_ENTRPRS ( ENTRPRS_SN ,ENTRPRS_NM ,BIZRNO ,RPRSNTV_NM ,REPRSNT_TELNO ,REPRSNT_FXNUM ,MFCRTR_AT ,IRTB_AT ,REPAIR_INDUTY_AT ,MESUR_PROOF_INDUTY_AT ,MRNR_EMPLYR_AT ,ATPT_RCEPT_AT ,MBER_AT ,REGIST_DT ,REGISTER_ID ,UPDT_DT ,UPDUSR_ID ,REGISTER_SE_CODE ,UPDUSR_SE_CODE ,HMPG_URL ) VALUES ( #EntrprsSn# ,#EntrprsNm# ,#Bizrno# ,#RprsntvNm# ,#ReprsntTelno# ,#ReprsntFxNum# ,#MfcrtrAt# ,#IrtbAt# ,#RepairIndutyAt# ,#MesurProofIndutyAt# ,#MrnrEmplyrAt# ,#AtptRceptAt# ,#MberAt# , SYSDATE ,#RegisterId# , SYSDATE ,#UpdusrId# ,#RegisterSeCode# ,#UpdusrSeCode# ,#HmpgUrl# )
statements.select: /* EntrprsDac.SelectEntrprs */ SELECT ENTRPRS_SN AS "EntrprsSn" , ENTRPRS_NM AS "EntrprsNm" /* 기업명 */ , BIZRNO AS "Bizrno" /* 사업자등록번호 */ , RPRSNTV_NM AS "RprsntvNm" /* 대표자명 */ , REPRSNT_TELNO AS "ReprsntTelno" /* 대표전화번호 */ , REPRSNT_FXNUM AS "ReprsntFxNum" /* 대표팩스번호 */ , MFCRTR_AT AS "MfcrtrAt" /* 제조업여부 */ , IRTB_AT AS "IrtbAt" /* 수입업여부 */ , REPAIR_INDUTY_AT AS "RepairIndutyAt" /* 수리업여부 */ , MESUR_PROOF_INDUTY_AT AS "MesurProofIndutyAt" /* 계량증명업여부 */ , MRNR_EMPLYR_AT AS "MrnrEmplyrAt" /* 계량기사용자여부 */ , ATPT_RCEPT_AT AS "AtptRceptAt" /* 시도접수여부 */ , MBER_AT AS "MberAt" /* 회원여부 */ , DELETE_AT AS "DeleteAt" /* 삭제여부 */ , FN_ENTRPRS_SE_NM('00',ENTRPRS_SN) AS "EnterpriseSectionName" /* 업체구분명 */ , REGIST_DT AS "RegistDt" /* 등록일시 */ , REGISTER_ID AS "RegisterId" /* 등록자ID */ , UPDT_DT AS "UpdtDt" /* 수정일시 */ , UPDUSR_ID AS "UpdusrId" /* 수정자ID */ , REGISTER_SE_CODE AS "RegisterSeCode" /* 등록자구분코드 */ , UPDUSR_SE_CODE AS "UpdusrSeCode" /* 수정자구분코드 */ , FN_USER_NM(REGISTER_SE_CODE, REGISTER_ID) AS "RegisterNm" /* 등록자명 */ , FN_USER_NM(UPDUSR_SE_CODE, UPDUSR_ID) AS "UpdusrNm" /* 수정자명 */ , HMPG_URL AS "HmpgUrl" /* 홈페이지URL */ FROM TN_ENTRPRS WHERE ENTRPRS_SN = #EntrprsSn#

/* EntrprsDac.SelectEntrprs */ SELECT ENTRPRS_SN AS "EntrprsSn" , ENTRPRS_NM AS "EntrprsNm" /* 기업명 */ , BIZRNO AS "Bizrno" /* 사업자등록번호 */ , RPRSNTV_NM AS "RprsntvNm" /* 대표자명 */ , REPRSNT_TELNO AS "ReprsntTelno" /* 대표전화번호 */ , REPRSNT_FXNUM AS "ReprsntFxNum" /* 대표팩스번호 */ , MFCRTR_AT AS "MfcrtrAt" /* 제조업여부 */ , IRTB_AT AS "IrtbAt" /* 수입업여부 */ , REPAIR_INDUTY_AT AS "RepairIndutyAt" /* 수리업여부 */ , MESUR_PROOF_INDUTY_AT AS "MesurProofIndutyAt" /* 계량증명업여부 */ , MRNR_EMPLYR_AT AS "MrnrEmplyrAt" /* 계량기사용자여부 */ , ATPT_RCEPT_AT AS "AtptRceptAt" /* 시도접수여부 */ , MBER_AT AS "MberAt" /* 회원여부 */ , DELETE_AT AS "DeleteAt" /* 삭제여부 */ , FN_ENTRPRS_SE_NM('00',ENTRPRS_SN) AS "EnterpriseSectionName" /* 업체구분명 */ , REGIST_DT AS "RegistDt" /* 등록일시 */ , REGISTER_ID AS "RegisterId" /* 등록자ID */ , UPDT_DT AS "UpdtDt" /* 수정일시 */ , UPDUSR_ID AS "UpdusrId" /* 수정자ID */ , REGISTER_SE_CODE AS "RegisterSeCode" /* 등록자구분코드 */ , UPDUSR_SE_CODE AS "UpdusrSeCode" /* 수정자구분코드 */ , FN_USER_NM(REGISTER_SE_CODE, REGISTER_ID) AS "RegisterNm" /* 등록자명 */ , FN_USER_NM(UPDUSR_SE_CODE, UPDUSR_ID) AS "UpdusrNm" /* 수정자명 */ , HMPG_URL AS "HmpgUrl" /* 홈페이지URL */ FROM TN_ENTRPRS WHERE BIZRNO = #Bizrno#
statements.update: /* EntrprsDac.DeleteEntrprs */ UPDATE TN_ENTRPRS SET DELETE_AT = 'Y' ,UPDT_DT = SYSDATE ,UPDUSR_ID = #UpdusrId# ,UPDUSR_SE_CODE = #UpdusrSeCode# WHERE ENTRPRS_SN = #EntrprsSn#

/* EntrprsDac.UpdateEntrprs */ UPDATE TN_ENTRPRS SET ENTRPRS_NM = #EntrprsNm# ,BIZRNO = #Bizrno# ,RPRSNTV_NM = #RprsntvNm# ,REPRSNT_TELNO = #ReprsntTelno# ,REPRSNT_FXNUM = #ReprsntFxNum# ,MFCRTR_AT = #MfcrtrAt# ,IRTB_AT = #IrtbAt# ,REPAIR_INDUTY_AT = #RepairIndutyAt# ,MESUR_PROOF_INDUTY_AT = #MesurProofIndutyAt# ,MRNR_EMPLYR_AT = #MrnrEmplyrAt# ,UPDT_DT = SYSDATE ,UPDUSR_ID = #UpdusrId# ,UPDUSR_SE_CODE = #UpdusrSeCode# ,HMPG_URL = #HmpgUrl# ,MBER_AT = #MberAt# WHERE ENTRPRS_SN = #EntrprsSn#
statements.insert: /* EntrprsDac.InsertEntrprsAdres */ INSERT INTO TN_ENTRPRS_ADRES ( ENTRPRS_ADRES_SN ,ENTRPRS_SN ,ENTRPRS_ADRES_SE_CODE ,ENTRPRS_ADRES_NM ,ADRES_TELNO ,ADRES_FXNUM ,ADRES_SE_CODE ,DETAIL_ADRES ,BASS_ADRES ,ZIP ,DMSTC_AT ) VALUES ( (SELECT NVL(MAX(ENTRPRS_ADRES_SN), 0) + 1 FROM TN_ENTRPRS_ADRES WHERE ENTRPRS_SN = #EntrprsSn#) ,#EntrprsSn# ,#EntrprsAdresSeCode# ,#EntrprsAdresNm# ,#AdresTelno# ,#AdresFxnum# ,#AdresSeCode# ,#DetailAdres# ,#BassAdres# ,#Zip# ,#DmstcAt# )
statements.delete: /* EntrprsDac.DeleteEntrprsAdres */ DELETE FROM TN_ENTRPRS_ADRES WHERE ENTRPRS_SN = #EntrprsSn#
statements.update: /* EntrprsDac.UpdateEntrprsAdres */ UPDATE TN_ENTRPRS_ADRES SET ENTRPRS_ADRES_SE_CODE = #EntrprsAdresSeCode# ,ENTRPRS_ADRES_NM = #EntrprsAdresNm# ,ADRES_TELNO = #AdresTelno# ,ADRES_SE_CODE = #AdresSeCode# ,DETAIL_ADRES = #DetailAdres# ,BASS_ADRES = #BassAdres# ,ZIP = #Zip# ,DMSTC_AT = #DmstcAt# WHERE ENTRPRS_ADRES_SN = #EntrprsAdresSn# AND ENTRPRS_SN = #EntrprsSn#
statements.select: /* EntrprsDac.SelectEntrprsAdres */ SELECT ENTRPRS_ADRES_SN AS "EntrprsAdresSn" ,ENTRPRS_SN AS "EntrprsSn" ,ENTRPRS_ADRES_SE_CODE AS "EntrprsAdresSeCode" ,FN_CMMN_CODE_NM(ENTRPRS_ADRES_SE_CODE) AS "EntrprsAdresSeCodeNm" ,ENTRPRS_ADRES_NM AS "EntrprsAdresNm" ,ADRES_TELNO AS "AdresTelno" ,ADRES_FXNUM AS "AdresFxnum" ,ADRES_SE_CODE AS "AdresSeCode" ,DETAIL_ADRES AS "DetailAdres" ,BASS_ADRES AS "BassAdres" ,ZIP AS "Zip" ,SUBSTR(ZIP, 0, 3) AS "Zip1" ,SUBSTR(ZIP, 4, 3) AS "Zip2" ,DMSTC_AT AS "DmstcAt" FROM TN_ENTRPRS_ADRES WHERE ENTRPRS_SN = #EntrprsSn# AND ENTRPRS_ADRES_SN = #EntrprsAdresSn#

/* EntrprsDac.SelectEntrprsAdres */ SELECT ENTRPRS_ADRES_SN AS "EntrprsAdresSn" ,ENTRPRS_SN AS "EntrprsSn" ,ENTRPRS_ADRES_SE_CODE AS "EntrprsAdresSeCode" ,FN_CMMN_CODE_NM(ENTRPRS_ADRES_SE_CODE) AS "EntrprsAdresSeCodeNm" ,ENTRPRS_ADRES_NM AS "EntrprsAdresNm" ,ADRES_TELNO AS "AdresTelno" ,ADRES_FXNUM AS "AdresFxnum" ,ADRES_SE_CODE AS "AdresSeCode" ,DETAIL_ADRES AS "DetailAdres" ,BASS_ADRES AS "BassAdres" ,ZIP AS "Zip" ,SUBSTR(ZIP, 0, 3) AS "Zip1" ,SUBSTR(ZIP, 4, 3) AS "Zip2" ,DMSTC_AT AS "DmstcAt" FROM TN_ENTRPRS_ADRES WHERE ENTRPRS_SN = #EntrprsSn# AND ENTRPRS_ADRES_SN = ( SELECT MAX(ENTRPRS_ADRES_SN) FROM TN_ENTRPRS_ADRES WHERE ENTRPRS_SN = #EntrprsSn# AND ENTRPRS_ADRES_SE_CODE = #EntrprsAdresSeCode# ) AND ENTRPRS_ADRES_SE_CODE = #EntrprsAdresSeCode#
/* EntrprsDac.SelectEntrprsBizrnoExistYn 기업 사업자번호 존재여부 조회*/ SELECT DECODE(COUNT(BIZRNO),0,'N','Y') AS ExistYn FROM TN_ENTRPRS WHERE BIZRNO = #Bizrno#

/* EntrprsDac.SelectMnfcturMrnrInfoList */ SELECT A.ENTRPRS_SN AS "EntrprsSn" /* 기업일련번호 */ , B.ENTRPRS_NM AS "EntrprsNm" /* 기업명 */ , A.MNFCTUR_MRNR_SN AS "MnfcturMrnrSn" /* 제조계량기일련번호 */ , A.MRNR_KND_CODE AS "MrnrKndCode" /* 계량기종류코드 */ , FN_CMMN_CODE_NM(A.MRNR_KND_CODE) AS "MrnrKndCodeNm" /* 계량기종류코드명 */ , A.MRNR_SCOPE_VALUE AS "MrnrScopeValue" /* 계량기범위값 */ , A.MRNR_SCOPE_UNIT_CODE AS "MrnrScopeUnitCode" /* 계량기범위단위코드 */ , FN_CMMN_CODE_NM(A.MRNR_SCOPE_UNIT_CODE) AS "MrnrScopeUnitCodeNm" /* 계량기범위단위코드명 */ , A.REGIST_DT AS "RegistDt" /* 등록일시 */ , A.REGISTER_SE_CODE AS "RegisterSeCode" /* 등록자구분코드 */ , A.REGISTER_ID AS "RegisterId" /* 등록자ID */ , A.UPDT_DT AS "UpdtDt" /* 수정일시 */ , A.UPDUSR_SE_CODE AS "UpdusrSeCode" /* 수정자구분코드 */ , A.UPDUSR_ID AS "UpdusrId" /* 수정자ID */ , FN_USER_NM(A.REGISTER_SE_CODE, A.REGISTER_ID) AS "RegisterNm" /* 등록자명 */ , FN_USER_NM(A.UPDUSR_SE_CODE, A.UPDUSR_ID) AS "UpdusrNm" /* 수정자명 */ FROM TN_MNFCTUR_MRNR_INFO A ,TN_ENTRPRS B WHERE B.ENTRPRS_SN = A.ENTRPRS_SN AND A.ENTRPRS_SN = #SearchEntrprsSn#
statements.insert:
SELECT NVL(MAX(MNFCTUR_MRNR_SN),0)+1 FROM TN_MNFCTUR_MRNR_INFO WHERE ENTRPRS_SN = #EntrprsSn#
/* MnfcturMrnrInfoDac.InsertMnfcturMrnrInfo */ INSERT INTO TN_MNFCTUR_MRNR_INFO ( ENTRPRS_SN ,MNFCTUR_MRNR_SN ,MRNR_KND_CODE ,MRNR_SCOPE_VALUE ,MRNR_SCOPE_UNIT_CODE ,REGIST_DT ,REGISTER_SE_CODE ,REGISTER_ID ,UPDT_DT ,UPDUSR_SE_CODE ,UPDUSR_ID ) VALUES ( #EntrprsSn# ,#MnfcturMrnrSn# ,#MrnrKndCode# ,#MrnrScopeValue# ,#MrnrScopeUnitCode# , SYSDATE ,#RegisterSeCode# ,#RegisterId# , SYSDATE ,#UpdusrSeCode# ,#UpdusrId# )
statements.delete:
/* EntrprsDac.DeleteMnfcturMrnrInfoOfEntrprs */
DELETE FROM TN_MNFCTUR_MRNR_INFO WHERE ENTRPRS_SN = #EntrprsSn#
statements.select: SELECT A.ENTRPRS_SN AS "EntrprsSn" /* 기업일련번호 */ , B.ENTRPRS_NM AS "EntrprsNm" /* 기업명 */ , A.MESUR_PROOF_SN AS "MesurProofSn" /* 계량증명업일련번호 */ , A.MRNR_KND_CODE AS "MrnrKndCode" /* 계량기종류코드 */ , FN_CMMN_CODE_NM(A.MRNR_KND_CODE) AS "MrnrKndCodeNm" /* 계량기종류코드명 */ , A.MRNR_SCOPE_VALUE AS "MrnrScopeValue" /* 계량기범위값 */ , A.MRNR_SCOPE_UNIT_CODE AS "MrnrScopeUnitCode" /* 계량기범위단위코드 */ , FN_CMMN_CODE_NM(A.MRNR_SCOPE_UNIT_CODE) AS "MrnrScopeUnitCodeNm" /* 계량기범위단위코드명 */ , A.ADRES_SE_CODE AS "AdresSeCode" /* 주소구분코드 */ , FN_CMMN_CODE_NM(A.ADRES_SE_CODE) AS "AdresSeCodeNm" /* 주소구분코드명 */ , A.ZIP AS "Zip" /* 우편번호 */ , A.BASS_ADRES AS "BassAdres" /* 기본주소 */ , A.DETAIL_ADRES AS "DetailAdres" /* 상세주소 */ , A.RECENT_ATHRZ_DE AS "RecentAthrzDe" /* 최근검정일자 */ , A.REGIST_DT AS "RegistDt" /* 등록일시 */ , A.REGISTER_SE_CODE AS "RegisterSeCode" /* 등록자구분코드 */ , A.REGISTER_ID AS "RegisterId" /* 등록자ID */ , A.UPDT_DT AS "UpdtDt" /* 수정일시 */ , A.UPDUSR_SE_CODE AS "UpdusrSeCode" /* 수정자구분코드 */ , A.UPDUSR_ID AS "UpdusrId" /* 수정자ID */ , FN_USER_NM(A.REGISTER_SE_CODE, A.REGISTER_ID) AS "RegisterNm" /* 등록자명 */ , FN_USER_NM(A.UPDUSR_SE_CODE, A.UPDUSR_ID) AS "UpdusrNm" /* 수정자명 */ FROM TN_MESUR_PROOF_INFO A ,TN_ENTRPRS B WHERE B.ENTRPRS_SN = A.ENTRPRS_SN AND A.ENTRPRS_SN = #SearchEntrprsSn#
statements.insert:
SELECT NVL(MAX(MESUR_PROOF_SN),0)+1 FROM TN_MESUR_PROOF_INFO WHERE ENTRPRS_SN = #EntrprsSn#
/* EntrprsDac.InsertMesurProofInfo */ INSERT INTO TN_MESUR_PROOF_INFO ( ENTRPRS_SN ,MESUR_PROOF_SN ,MRNR_KND_CODE ,MRNR_SCOPE_VALUE ,MRNR_SCOPE_UNIT_CODE ,ADRES_SE_CODE ,ZIP ,BASS_ADRES ,DETAIL_ADRES ,RECENT_ATHRZ_DE ,REGIST_DT ,REGISTER_SE_CODE ,REGISTER_ID ,UPDT_DT ,UPDUSR_SE_CODE ,UPDUSR_ID ) VALUES ( #EntrprsSn# ,#MesurProofSn# ,#MrnrKndCode# ,#MrnrScopeValue# ,#MrnrScopeUnitCode# ,#AdresSeCode# ,#Zip# ,#BassAdres# ,#DetailAdres# ,#RecentAthrzDe# , SYSDATE ,#RegisterSeCode# ,#RegisterId# , SYSDATE ,#UpdusrSeCode# ,#UpdusrId# )
statements.delete:
/* EntrprsDac.DeleteMesurProofInfoOfEntrprs */
DELETE FROM TN_MESUR_PROOF_INFO WHERE ENTRPRS_SN = #EntrprsSn#
statements.select:
/* EntrprsDac.SelectEntrprsRcognInfoList */ SELECT ENTRPRS_SN AS "EntrprsSn" /* 기업일련번호 */ , ENTRPRS_RCOGN_INFO_SN AS "EntrprsRcognInfoSn" /* 기업인정정보일련번호 */ , RCOGN_SE_CODE AS "RcognSeCode" /* 인정구분코드 */ , FN_CMMN_CODE_NM(RCOGN_SE_CODE) AS "RcognSeCodeNm" /* 인정구분코드명 */ , RCOGN_NO_NM AS "RcognNoNm" /* 인정번호명 */ , RCOGN_DE AS "RcognDe" /* 인정일자 */ FROM TN_ENTRPRS_RCOGN_INFO WHERE 1=1
AND ENTRPRS_SN = #SearchEntrprsSn#
AND RCOGN_SE_CODE = #SearchRcognSeCode# /* 인정구분코드 */
AND (RCOGN_SE_CODE = 'AC028001' OR RCOGN_SE_CODE = 'AC028002') /* 제조.수리여부 */
ORDER BY ENTRPRS_SN DESC , ENTRPRS_RCOGN_INFO_SN DESC
statements.insert:
SELECT NVL(MAX(ENTRPRS_RCOGN_INFO_SN),0)+1 FROM TN_ENTRPRS_RCOGN_INFO WHERE ENTRPRS_SN = #EntrprsSn#
/* EntrprsDac.InsertEntrprsRcognInfo */ INSERT INTO TN_ENTRPRS_RCOGN_INFO ( ENTRPRS_SN ,ENTRPRS_RCOGN_INFO_SN ,RCOGN_SE_CODE ,RCOGN_NO_NM ,RCOGN_DE ) VALUES ( #EntrprsSn# ,#EntrprsRcognInfoSn# ,#RcognSeCode# ,#RcognNoNm# ,#RcognDe# )
statements.select: /* EntrprsDac.SelectEntrprsChghstList */ SELECT ENTRPRS_SN AS "EntrprsSn" /* 기업일련번호 */ , ENTRPRS_CHGHST_SN AS "EntrprsChghstSn" /* 기업변경이력일련번호 */ , CHANGE_DE AS "ChangeDe" /* 변경일자 */ , CHANGE_CN AS "ChangeCn" /* 변경내용 */ , REGISTER_SE_CODE AS "RegisterSeCode" /* 등록자구분코드 */ , REGISTER_ID AS "RegisterId" /* 등록자ID */ , REGIST_DT AS "RegistDt" /* 등록일시 */ , FN_USER_NM(REGISTER_SE_CODE, REGISTER_ID) AS "RegisterNm" /* 등록자명 */ FROM TN_ENTRPRS_CHGHST WHERE ENTRPRS_SN = #SearchEntrprsSn# ORDER BY ENTRPRS_SN DESC , ENTRPRS_CHGHST_SN DESC
statements.insert:
SELECT NVL(MAX(ENTRPRS_CHGHST_SN),0)+1 FROM TN_ENTRPRS_CHGHST WHERE ENTRPRS_SN = #EntrprsSn#
/* EntrprsDac.InsertEntrprsChghst */ INSERT INTO TN_ENTRPRS_CHGHST ( ENTRPRS_SN ,ENTRPRS_CHGHST_SN ,CHANGE_DE ,CHANGE_CN ,REGISTER_SE_CODE ,REGISTER_ID ,REGIST_DT ) VALUES ( #EntrprsSn# ,#EntrprsChghstSn# ,#ChangeDe# ,#ChangeCn# ,#RegisterSeCode# ,#RegisterId# , SYSDATE )
